mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.FREE_NO, A.COMM_CONTENT,A.COMM_CREATE_DATE, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.GROUP_ORDER, A.USER_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, COMM_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, FREE_NO, COMM_CONTENT,COMM_CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER, USER_NO FROM FREE_COMMENT WHERE FREE_NO = #{freeNO}) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
